00017 // Watchdog Registers
00018 typedef struct
00019 {
00020   REG_8 mod;                            // Watchdog Mode Register
00021   REG_8 _pad0[3];
00022   REG32 tc;                             // Watchdog Time Constant Register
00023   REG_8 feed;                           // Watchdog Feed Register
00024   REG32 tv;                             // Watchdog Time Value Register
00025 } wdRegs_t;
